website_summaries.verdict: A good looking unit that is durable and works very well.
pros: Handles make it easy to carry and interior bag is easy to remove
cons: Only one bag and two would have been nice for sorting clothes
Also, wood might warp in high humidity environment

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this laundry basket...loved the style and color. Upon attempting to assemble it, however...the metal pieces supplied to lock the sides and bottom into place were cheap, cheap cheap...several sheared off. It seemed like the metal lock screws (for lack of a better name) didnt line up with the screw heads they were designed for. I've assembled dozens of items before, so can't blame it on inexperience. Ended up returning it. Advice to company: spend a little more on R & D design and quality of fasteners.
customer_reviews.author: Robinp

customer_reviews.title: looks great and the right size
customer_reviews.text: Not real wood. It looks handsome, looks great and the right size. Looked so good I put it together and threw away the packaging. Two days later the coating (it's like a plastic film) started peeling off and never stopped. Being I had thrown away box and packaging I knew I was now stuck with it. Also every so often many of the screws have to be tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: A nightmare to assemble.  Plan two hours, three people and four glasses of wine.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I was pleased to read it should not take more than 20 minutes to assemble. Two hours later, I felt like throwing the darn thing out the window. The hardware doesn’t fit right and even using an electric screwdriver, the fittings wouldn’t tighten. It’s together, wobbly and I’m over it. I’m going to keep it because it’s fine as long as I don’t have to move it but this wasn’t my idea of a wonderful Saturday night. Well, at least it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: C. Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Pieces don't stay together
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk, don't waste your time. The casters needed to fasten the long screws to hold it together don't hold it together. Ocean Star customer service was not helpful at all. They said they would get back to me and never did.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hamper but unfortunately it was missing some parts. Amazon accepted the return, which was super easy to process, and they picked it up the next day. My refund was also super fast and done as soon as the item was received by UPS (the return carrier).. I order another one, and it was received quickly (within a couple days). This one is absolutely perfect. No missing parts, easy to assemble, and works great for my needs. Thanks for making this purchase a smooth transaction. I'm a happy camper with my new hamper! :o)
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Not the most durable
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first. Easy to assemble and looked good for having to have it out in a hallway. I’ve had it 3 months and the bottom has popped out. I need to see if I can reinforce it, but I should’ve have to. We use this for dirty towels only so sometimes being damp they are heavier but shouldn’t cause damage to the hamper.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Evans

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks nice in the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why people are complaining about the quality of the wood. It is real wood. It's not best finishing job I've ever seen, but it's certainly not warping or coming apart. My master bath is nearly the size of my kid's rooms so maybe that and the heat or ac keeps the humidity very low helps. I like it and it looks nice in the bathroom. It's study for what it is. It's not furniture you can sit on. It's a hamper. The laundry bag is removable so it never needs to move. I expect it to last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Boy

customer_reviews.title: Most expensive cheap item.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a slightly damaged package. I think this was a return because once I started putting it together I found out that there wasn't the plastic rubber foundation on one side in order for me to screw the posts that hold the hamper together. I would not recommend purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good looking laundry box
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking laundry box, we wanted something to match the wood in my husbands recently redone closet and it looks beautiful in there. It’s a good size, the quality could be a bit better as far as the wood is concerned but for the money this is what you get, having said that we do love it and are happy with the purchase. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE D

customer_reviews.title: Good design, decent materials, poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and easy to assemble, but the workmanship left a lot to be desired. The hole for one of the dowels was broken through to the other side, there were runs from the finish, the edges of the slats were never sanded, some of the joinery just needed a little sanding to make the joint line smooth, one edge was splintered, the pilot holes for the hinges and catch arm were drilled in the wrong place. Disappointing quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wood Laundry Hamper
customer_reviews.text: Putting this laundry hamper together took me 20 minutes. Only required a screwdriver to get it done. A tool is included to use on the screws if you do not have a screwdriver. TIPS: Put the hamper together on firm, flat flooring/surface -- not on a carpet/rug. Doing this on a carpet/rug can cause the hamper bottom to be uneven. Do not store hamper near any heating units since this is a wood product and it would become warped over time. Also want to avoid a possible fire hazard! I like the color of the wood. The laundry bag inside is washable. The lid has a notch in it to enable ease in opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Regala

customer_reviews.title: Not this one!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The box it comes in would work better. Will fall apart so after it’s put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like but requires a little more effort.
customer_reviews.text: Like the previous reviews reported, the parts easily come apart; I believe it’s due to the dowels being to small. I still bought it; used a hot glue gun to fill the holes and then stuck the dowels in. After we used the hot glue, the piece is very nice and appears to be 10x better than a plastic laundry basket. I would say, just be advised you may have to put in about 15 mins more work to make it stable. Otherwise, I am happy with the piece.
customer_reviews.author: Golda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wooden hamper!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color & overall appearance when it is was finish bring assembled. If my husband had not been good at doing things - it would hot have gotten put together. Directions were a little tricky. But - overall it is a beautiful unit that is well built!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Flener

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare to put together screws don't align properly
customer_reviews.text: I have built many items in the past, this hamper was a nightmare. The screws that suppose to lock with cams don't seem to line up. I kept adjusting different heights with screws but then the cam nuts break. Sorry I don't recommend The only plus it's solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: Lucimar

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, easy assembly but follow directions exactly.
customer_reviews.text: I really like it . Does exactly what I wanted and looks really good. A quality piece of furniture. It said it took 2 people to put it together but I went slow and methodical and it went together very easily for me all by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply designed
customer_reviews.text: Well the wood is nice..but the assembly is a joke the sides are held together by little metal cams that turn on a pin. They break very easily...and the darn thing falls apart every other time you empty it..I took a small drill and drilled pilot holes and used finishing nails and put it back together after re assembling it 6 or seven times!! Since I changed the way it came from the manufacturer it has been great..but if you aren’t prepared to drill pilot holes and carefully nail it together? DO NOT BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Martin

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, it hides standard bathroom junk/brushes.
customer_reviews.text: Easily assembled, listed dimensions accurate. We use it to hide the toilet brushes/plunger, and baby diaper pail. It looks so much better than those dirty white plastic items we hide inside, but now they are still close and available where we need them.
customer_reviews.author: The Bradleys

customer_reviews.title: Buy another brand
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great on the shelf but buyers beware. The assembly parts are substandard and the panels were warped preventing proper alignment and assembly. Also, the connectors were junk. They broke, got jammed and were poorly made. For the price there surely is a better product out there.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T Sica

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced....not worth $70 to have to assemble yourself and poor quality with laminate/sealant peeling and lid cracked when screwing bracket in. Not worth my time to disassemble and return but suggest a better quality hamper at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because I need a large hamper in the bedroom. It also looks nice and seems sturdy while holding a lot of clothes. Pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great hamper for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hamper to match the wood of our new bedroom set. Color is perfect and it looks nice in our bedroom. Lid keeps dirty clothes contained in hamper. Only drawback is the size it’s not a big a plastic Rubbermaid one so I bought two (his and hers). Works great and because of the size it reminds me to do a load of laundry during the week.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Krzywicki

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: This will add a nice touch to a hallway. It is very nice looking, but it doesn't hold that much clothes. Maybe one loads worth at most.
customer_reviews.author: L.Young

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful, just like picture. High quality and very sturdy. I love how I just grab canvas bag inside, to carry laundry to washer.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Great Hamper
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to assemble, but takes some effort; good looking and solid when assembled. Removable bag works out very well by slightly stretching metal holding rods to take bag in or out.
customer_reviews.author: JimRoch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, came well packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to assemble. I actually bought it to conceal a container for my recycling bin.
customer_reviews.author: CDigs

customer_reviews.title: I liked the one I bought for my husband so much I wanted my own
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I liked the one I bought for my husband so much I wanted my own. Looks great in the bedroom. This one came with some scratches on the front, I used Old English stain cover and they disappeared (well, were masked). Not noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty handy and assembling this took about 30 mins. Looks fantastic and should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: PVD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Quality
customer_reviews.text: Packed extremely well. Each piece was rapped and in sheets of styrofoam. Very easy to put together! Solid wood. Looks beautiful (for a hamper!). Not a scratch or loose part anywhere. It doesnt look like something you put together from a box!
customer_reviews.author: C. Doerr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality wood
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid, attractive, and functional item. Price is a bit steep for a laundry bin, but we wanted something attractive enough that it doesn't need to be hidden in a corner, and this fits the bill. It takes a bit of time to put together, but once done is really stable. Highly recommend this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ree from Miami

customer_reviews.title: i like it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: i was hesitant to purchase this after seeing a few reviews that said it wasn't that sturdy, but i ordered it. i'm really happy with it. assembly took about 20 minutes, everything dovetailed nicely, and it has a nice, unpretentious profile. plus, my cat can sit on the top and the hamper withstands his weight. its capacity is a bit on the small side and i'm considering getting another one so i can have separate hampers for whites and darks.
customer_reviews.author: Olga G.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and holds more than my previous hamper. Was also easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Simple cam locks and two screws makes for easy assembly. The inner liner can be simply lifted ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple cam locks and two screws makes for easy assembly. The inner liner can be simply lifted out by the two hanging rods so you don't have to even reach in to unload the hamper. The unit is plenty sturdy enough to sit on. The bottom isn't hardwood like the rest of the hamper, but the back is. I can foresee that bottom bit getting wet and possibly getting wonky over time, but a light coat of wood oil and the hamper would do well in a spa.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Snappy

customer_reviews.title: My mom loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hamper for my mom, who wanted to update her bathroom. She loved it - said it really went well with the cabinets in her bath and fit just perfectly (and that's saying a lot since her bathroom isn't that big). She said it holds a week's worth of her clothes. Nice and sturdy, too, and she put it together herself with no problems. She's 83 years old, so that says something! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged. Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: These are a great deal. Nice wood look and easy to assemble. However, we ordered 2 of them and both were damaged in the same spot. I am assuming this was because of packaging and not because of a shipping issue. Both hampers had gouges on the top of the doors which is visible after assembly. Not sure on what can be done to replace or repair them as they are imported.
customer_reviews.author: MATT WHITECOMB

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that color wasn't as expected. Bonus that liner is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Good product and easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive when this product arrived. It required "some" assembly. But I have to say, it really was simple to put together. It took about 10 minutes. The best part? It cost about 1/2 of what I had paid for a very similar product at Bed Bath & Beyond a week earlier. Ten minutes or $70.00? You decide.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Looks
customer_reviews.text: Almost all Cam Locks Broke While Installing. I had to buy from somewhere else to finish the item.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Stine

customer_reviews.title: much better than the first one we received.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of two we ordered. The first one was obviously opened and not in the packaging from the factory. The wood was split and broken on two of the panels, so we packaged it up and returned it this morning. Hamper #2 is so nice, that we are going to order a third just for my wifes delicates and handwash items.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff E.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy & attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful wood. Lovely addition to any room for such a practical item.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY J ELLINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and attractive hamper.
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is well constructed. It is also quite attractive; nice wood and finish. It’s extremely sturdy. I can sit on it without fear of collapse.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Green

customer_reviews.title: Should have been bigger
customer_reviews.text: This is durable easy to put together. Just for the coast it should have been bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel stallard

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately my husband is a talented woodworker
customer_reviews.text: The picture of this hamper doesn't reflect it's true, very orange color. Construction is somewhat sloppy, screws for the lid are angled such that half of the screw head is sticking out. Fortunately my husband is a talented woodworker, capable of fixing the construction problems, changing the color, and replacing the cardboard bottom with one made of Masonite, otherwise it would have been returned. I don't feel this hamper is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kzoo

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of this hamper and it wasn't difficult to assemble, but it just doesn't feel like it's well made. Some of the joints have gaps that can't be tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Quality hamper - it's great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wood and looks great in home. Much nicer than many of those less expensive hampers. This is well worth the money for a spa look hamper that is durable, clean looking and good quality. Easy to assemble. When putting lid on I would recommend laying hamper and lid on floor to line up holes with lid rather than trying to do it with hamper in upright standing position. Don't fight gravity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice in our room and is quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I had to rig something to correct the missing screw insert.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Burkholder

customer_reviews.title: Nice But Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking hamper and very easy to put together however after about 6 months I have needed to use wood screws to keep the hamper together. The rear wood panel appears to have slightly warped so the connection assembly in one of the lower rear corners simply will not stay together for longer than a day or so now. For $80 I expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price, very easy to assemble, looks great, and very sturdy. This was exactly what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff E

customer_reviews.title: Good to use with a kitchen garbage can also.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to use in the kitchen with a garbage can put inside of it. I have two dogs that can get into anything and so far they haven't been able to get into the trash since I received this (hamper).
customer_reviews.author: Bmillward

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son and had it shipped straight to his house so I did not get to see it or put it together. He seems to really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for the money. Let's face it, it's not teak but a nice looking imitation. Sturdy enough for a reasonable adult but probably not a great product for a rambunctious kid. Easy enough to put together if you are detail oriented.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Tasteful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful in the hallway; fairly easy to construct; solid. Appears exactly as illustrated in the listing. JEM
customer_reviews.author: SJ McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: When putting the pieces together we quickly learned that the holes do not match up. When putting the sides together, we learned that there is nothing holding the sides together. You’d have to buy glue and glue all the pieces or they will always come apart
customer_reviews.author: Dessirae Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Hamper arrived cracked in several spots. Appears to have been wood glued back together again during manufacturing. Once assembled, it was pretty sturdy but the turn lock screw design does not hold pieces together well when packed with clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, but I like the design. The wood is finished with a cheap finish and there are cracks in the grain. It looks much better in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Patti from PA

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: wooden laundry hampers are very difficult to find anywhere, even on the internet. When you do find one is it usually very expensive. This is a nice looking, well made, inexpensive alternative - and the only one I've ever seen on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good hamper, works fine, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: R. Milley

customer_reviews.title: The assembly directions could be better and the pin holding the front doesn't hold.
customer_reviews.text: The assembly directions could be better and the pin holding the front, back and sides together could be a lot better. This is a piece of crap. The connectors do NOT hold. It keeps falling apart. I'm ready to get some dowel rods and glue.
customer_reviews.author: Texas golfer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Somewhat confusing directions but once together it is sturdy, quite roomy, functional and beautiful too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: N ot totally Kid proof,,, but what is !!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Not exactly kid proof. I had to repair it by gluing and adding finishing screws...they were stomping the dirty garments down when it got full...
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid wood piece that looks great
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is not only lovely, but it is very solid and heavy duty. I was tired of my old wicker hamper that was torn to shreds by my cats. Finally paid the money for this wooden hamper and it is so worth it. Nice solid wood piece that looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction / Good Size
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my recently remodeled master bath. It works very well and if you take the time to secure the screws well will be very sturdy. Great price / Value mix here.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bernat

customer_reviews.title: Teak clothes hamper doubles as nice decorative piece in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks great. Looks like a nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HAMPER
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and very attractive. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R. Brix

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: had to put some glue on it to keep the sides on tightly
customer_reviews.author: suzette

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My mom got one and I liked it. I got two of them..a lot nicer looking than a cheap plastic hamper.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBeeGracious

customer_reviews.title: Please include assembly time required est x minutes/ hours
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the product but NOT the fact it took me 2 hours to assembly with the tools provided. Please mention assembly required and have customers provide feedback on time spent. Those 6 short countersink hinge screws were very slow process wish I had a Phillips that fit that better, I did not.. WOULD NOT HAVE BOUGHT IF KNOWN THE EXTENT OF THE ASSEMBLY NEEDED
customer_reviews.author: Scot A Vann

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of junk. It is extremely difficult to put together, then, if you can put it together it doesn't stay together. It's too late to return it, so it's going in the garbage. I wouldn't even put it in the Useables section in the dump!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but some of the locking mechanisms that hold it ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but some of the locking mechanisms that hold it together were broken so I eventually had to just use liquid nails to hold it together. And be prepared to spend some time putting this thing together. It does look nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa5912

customer_reviews.title: Great look and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my screened porch by my pool to hold beach/pool towels. Matched my teak furniture and is a great size for folded pool towels. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great article
customer_reviews.text: It’s important that the interior measures have to be included by the time you choose the item.
customer_reviews.author: Hector R. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Okay if you don't mind doing laundry every other day
customer_reviews.text: Quality is so so, as I've had to fix it to keep it from coming apart on occasion. Capacity is okay, but the wife and I fill it up in two days. Other. Given the chance, I would not buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bond

customer_reviews.title: Nice hamper after it took three days to put it ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice hamper after it took three days to put it together....it took three trips to the hardware store to buy screws & bolts because they kept breaking or bending. If you don't have patience putting something together I would advise not to buy it. Not happy buying three sets of screws and bolts to get it together for the price of the hamper..
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Brown

customer_reviews.title: A nice look at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking item. The capacity isn’t huge, but it is a full machine load for my dark/mixed items.
customer_reviews.author: JB_Florida

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions aren’t very clear. Assembly took longer then expected. Other then that we are very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hamper!  Solid but no real directions to put it together and was a real pain.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the hamper and the size but was a pain to put together! Definitely needed 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Markuz

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother actually using the hamper.
customer_reviews.text: The wood and the finish are absolutely beautiful which is why I avoided the one star. It won't stay assembled. The hardware to hold the pieces together are the shoddiest pieces of junk ever! They have all sheared and I have had to resort to zip ties to hold the pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: jeeepgeek

customer_reviews.title: fit in my bathroom  :)
customer_reviews.text: very good quality, and the size is perfect for my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Javier Sierraalta

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This took me over an hour to put together. It’s a cheap design and cheap materials. I’d suggest finding an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Matt McHale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice in my bathroom, just wish It was bigger. Would get another one if bigger
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Cheap screws and bolts that break easily
customer_reviews.text: The hardware that came with it was super cheap low quality and snapped on assembly it’s already broken
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Inside bag very handy to remove for ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Inside bag very handy to remove for hauling laundry without having to move the wooden hamper.
customer_reviews.author: Karlos

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality - looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice laundry Hamper. Took a bit of time to assemble but well worth it. Very strong and love the handles to carry it to the laundry room to wash clothes!!! Would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Nice but no assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and a pretty color. Smaller than I thought and no assembly instructions! I figured it out but it would have been nice to have something to reference. It was cheapest on Amazon compared to other sites with the same product, and free shipping because I'm an Amazon Prime member...can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Bond

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and great price. Takes two people to assemble it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M.

customer_reviews.title: Clothes Hamper
customer_reviews.text: This clothes hamper is built really well and I think it will last for a long time. It vents the clothing really well too. Oh yeah, it looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Ribbitter

customer_reviews.title: Rods are too short to hold up liner.  Other than that, quite nice.
customer_reviews.text: The rods are too short to hold up the liner, they keep falling down inside. The notches where they slip into on each side are 5/16" deep. The rods could be 1/2 longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality and good price very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, elegant looking
customer_reviews.text: Very functional with good capacity for two people. Not intended for a large family
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, handsome, and functional
customer_reviews.text: Fine piece of furniture, not cheap junk. Sturdy, handsome, and functional.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful yet functional
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. This is a sturdy but beautiful hamper. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Carey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, directions for putting it together were a bit confusing though.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: looks good, put keep falling a part would not suggest ...
customer_reviews.text: looks good , put keep falling a part would not suggest this product al all
customer_reviews.author: gabi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Laundy Hamper
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. It was very easy to assemble, functions well and looks great in our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sister because her dog tends to steal socks out of their hamper. I thought one with a lid would be a good solution. They love it. It's a great size, and works very well. Good quality, nice and easy to put together. I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Neu

customer_reviews.title: Better than anticipated!!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together. The finish on the wood is very nice, smooth, satiny. Looks good. Glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie P

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality and holds up well, no problems with the lid
customer_reviews.author: gregg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, perfect in my bathroom, very sturdy and right coloring
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Heidemann

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Got 2 for cold and hot wash separation
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Got 2 for cold and hot wash separation.
customer_reviews.author: almostabner

product_meta.title: Oceanstar Solid Wood Spa Laundry Hamper
product_meta.description: Conceal your dirty laundry in fashion and decorate your bed and bath space with the uniquely designed Oceanstar Solid Wood Spa Hamper. The elegant hamper accessorizes any room and offers plenty of space for your laundry. The slatted presentation of the wood hamper not only adds a contemporary design, but is also durable and functional as it provides air passage through the hamper. The interior bag in the hamper is removable so you can transport and carry your laundry from one room to another. Raised bottom: 1.5 inches from ground
feature_bullets: Hand grips on both sides for easy carrying
Easy to open lid that stays open so you do not need to hold onto the top
Dimensions: 13.25 W x 24.75 H x 20 L inches; Item Weight: 17 Lbs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
